regexCodeList.string: Password correct. Welcome to Lusternia.

Trigger.name: Concord customprompt
Trigger.script: raiseEvent("concord before prompt") if promptgag then promptgag = false elseif concord.customPrompt then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.modulebal == "-1" then selectString(matches[1],1) replace("") cecho(concord.customPrompt.display()) end end raiseEvent("concord after prompt")

regexCodeList.string: ^You have given up knowledge of (\w+) for the time being.$

Trigger.name: Got a skillset
Trigger.script: sendGMCP("Char.Skills.Get {\"group\":\"" .. matches[2] .. "\"}") send(" ",false) raiseEvent("concord got skill",matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^You swell in pride as you choose to become a student of (\w+).$
You cry out as your deaf ears open up to the sound of a high-pitched note.
Your ears open up, though you lose your true hearing.
^\w+ plays .+, and you cry out as your deaf ears open up to the sound of a high-pitched note\.$

Trigger.name: Got perfectfifth
Trigger.script: concord.affl["earache"] = true tempTimer(5, [[concord.affl["earache"] = false]]) concord.affl["attraction"] = true raiseEvent("concord updated affs") concord.echo("perfectfifth")

regexCodeList.string: ^The lyrical sound invokes a strange longing for \w+\.$
The ache in your ear canals clears up.
You now possess the gift of truehearing.
You find you cannot bear to part from
^attracted to \w+\.
You lose your attraction to
You move sluggishly into action.

Trigger.name: We got pitted
Trigger.script: tempTimer(1,[[send("climb up")]]) tempTimer(1,[[send("climb up")]]) tempTimer(1,[[send("climb up")]])

regexCodeList.string: The ground suddenly falls away from beneath you and you go tumbling into a pit, landing painfully on the hard ground.
You are stuck in a pit and must CLIMB UP to get out before you can move.
You have cured aeon.
The aura surrounding you briefly pulses.

Trigger.name: We lost an aff
Trigger.script: deleteLine() concord.echo("Cure: <green>"..matches[2]) concord.affl[matches[2]] = nil raiseEvent("Concord lost aff "..matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^You have cured (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: We got an aff
Trigger.script: deleteLine() concord.echo("Gain: <red>"..matches[2]) concord.affl[matches[2]] = true raiseEvent("Concord got aff "..matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^You are afflicted with (\w+)\.$
You have been slain by

Trigger.name: Clear status
Trigger.script: if gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp == "0" then concord.escape = false concord.affl = {} end

regexCodeList.string: return isPrompt()
As your soul leaves your body, the elixir vitae courses through your spirit and suddenly bursts in a bright light, forming a new body around your soul.

Trigger.name: We stood up
Trigger.script: concord.echo("Cure: <green>sprawled") concord.affl["sprawled"] = nil raiseEvent("Concord lost aff sprawled")

Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("Concord diagnose gag", 0) setTriggerStayOpen("Concord diagnose enemy", 0) local tar = concord.diagnosetarget or "Aramel" raiseEvent("concord effects",tar) raiseEvent("concord diagnosed",concord.diagnosetarget) concord.onDiagnose(concord.diagnosetarget,concord.diagnosedo)

Trigger.name: Wounds
Trigger.script: local str = string.lower(matches[2]) str = str:gsub("%s+", "") concord.roomPlayers[concord.temptarget]["vitals"][str.."wounds"]=matches[3] deleteLine()

regexCodeList.string: ^\* (.*?) has (\w+) wounds.$

Trigger.name: Concord discern end
Trigger.script:
setTriggerStayOpen("Concord discern", 0) if concord.insta then
else raiseEvent("concord discerned",concord.temptarget) concord.onDiscern(concord.temptarget,concord.instanow) end

regexCodeList.string: return isPrompt()
You scent at the air, your skilled nose picking up the faint traces of others in the surrounding area.
the faint traces of others in the nearby area.

return isPrompt()
return isPrompt()

Trigger.name: Person aeoned
Trigger.script: if multimatches[2][2] == concord.target and concord.canAuto() then -- expandAlias("asth "..multimatches[2][2]) end if not ndb.isenemy(multimatches[2][2]) and farheal.canDo() then send("sm insert cure "..multimatches[2][2].." auric") end concord.gotEffect(concord.target,"aeon",6) --concord.call(multimatches[2][2].." is aeoned.", 2)

regexCodeList.string: ^Suddenly \w+'s movements through the time stream are slowed.$
^Suddenly (\w+)'s movements through the time stream are slowed.$
^(\w+) begins to (?:tumble|roll) towards the (\w+).$
^(\w+) prepares to somersault to the (\w+).$

Trigger.name: Person entered the area
Trigger.script: if not concord.enteredarea then concord.enteredarea = {} end if ndb.isenemy(matches[2]) or concord.calling >= 3 then concord.enteredarea[#concord.enteredarea+1] = matches[2] end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) has entered the area.$

Trigger.name: Person entered end
Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("Person entered the area",0) if #concord.enteredarea > 0 then local str = table.concat(concord.enteredarea, ", ") if not concord.isNeutralArea(gmcp.Room.Info) then concord.call(str.." entered "..gmcp.Room.Info.area) end end concord.enteredarea = {}

Trigger.name: Person left area
Trigger.script: if not concord.leftarea then concord.leftarea = {} end if ndb.isenemy(matches[2]) or concord.calling >= 3 then concord.leftarea[#concord.leftarea+1] = matches[2] end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) has left the area.$

Trigger.name: Person left end
Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("Person left area",0) if #concord.leftarea > 0 then local str = table.concat(concord.leftarea, ", ") if not concord.isNeutralArea(gmcp.Room.Info) then concord.call(str.." left "..gmcp.Room.Info.area) end end concord.leftarea = {}

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Ironhart Collective\): \w+ says(?:.+)(\d\d\d\d\d)
^\(Ironhart Collective\): \w+ says(?:.+)(\d\d\d\d)

Trigger.name: Person passing adjacent (ears)
Trigger.script: if not concord.passingroom then concord.passingroom = {} end if not concord.passingroom[matches[3]] then concord.passingroom[matches[3]] = {} end if not table.contains(concord.passingroom[matches[3]], matches[2]) then concord.passingroom[matches[3]][#concord.passingroom[matches[3]]+1] = matches[2] end concord.roomRemove(matches[2]) deleteLine()

regexCodeList.string: ^You sense the passage of (.+) to the (\w+) with .+\.$

Trigger.name: Person passing adjacent end
Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("Person passing adjacent (ears)",0) for dir,tab in pairs(concord.passingroom) do local str1, str2 local enemy = false local colortab = {} for i,name in ipairs(tab) do if concord.target == name or string.find(name, "masked") then enemy = true end if ndb.getcolor(name) then colortab[#colortab+1] = ndb.getcolor(name)..name else colortab[#colortab+1] = name end end str1 = table.concat(colortab,"<tomato>, ") local plural = " is " if #tab > 1 then plural = " are " end concord.echo(str1.."<tomato>"..plural.."to the <yellow>"..string.upper(dir)) if enemy and not concord.isNeutralArea(gmcp.Room.Info) then str2 = table.concat(tab, ", ") concord.call(str2..plural.."to the "..string.upper(dir),2) end end concord.passingroom = {}

regexCodeList.string: ^(?!You sense the passage of)
You follow
follows you
(\w+) is here, flying far above.
^(\w+) flits into view directly overhead.$

Trigger.name: Person shielded
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == concord.target then concord.box(matches[2].." SHIELDED","cornflower_blue","O~",matches[2]) concord.doClear(true) concord.doInsert(concord.commands.raze,matches[2],false) else concord.echo("O~O~O~O~"..ndb.getcolor(matches[2])..matches[2].."<cornflower_blue> SHIELDED~O~O~O~O") end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) mutters and traces a cobalt blue pentagram in the air that remains hovering before \w+.$

^(\w+) is suddenly surrounded by cobalt blue sparks.$

^A flash of dark bloody light erupts from (\w+)'s shield and scours \w+'s flesh, leaving deep bloody gashes across \w+ body.$

Trigger.name: Person goggles enter
Trigger.script: concord.echo(ndb.getcolor(matches[2])..matches[2].."<yellow> IN ROOM") if matches[2] == concord.target then concord.call(matches[2].." is here at v"..gmcp.Room.Info.num,3) end

regexCodeList.string: ^A shimmer of light plays on your goggle lenses as (\w+) arrives
^(\w+) flits into view directly overhead.$

Trigger.name: Person goggles leave
Trigger.script: concord.echo(ndb.getcolor(matches[2])..matches[2].."<dark_orange> LEFT to the <yellow>"..string.upper(matches[3])) if matches[2] == concord.target then concord.call(matches[2].." left to the "..string.upper(matches[3]).." from v"..gmcp.Room.Info.num,3) end

regexCodeList.string: ^A shimmer of light plays on your goggle lenses as (\w+) departs to (\w+).$
^(\w+) flies away to the beyond.$

Trigger.name: Concord track balance time
Trigger.script: local str = matches[2] local bal if string.find(str,"equilibrium") then bal = "equilibrium" end if string.find(str,"balance on all limbs") then bal = "balance" end if string.find(str,"left") then bal = "left" end if string.find(str,"right") then bal = "right" end if string.find(str,"arm") then bal = bal.."_arm" end if string.find(str,"leg") then bal = bal.."_leg" end concord.gotbal(nil,bal) decho(" <210,105,30>("..concord.balancetime.."s)")

regexCodeList.string: ^You have recovered (.+)\.

Trigger.name: Concord beckoned
Trigger.script: if concord.justmoved then local dir,back = concord.gotMovedDir(concord.lastroom,gmcp.Room.Info.num) back = string.upper(mmp.anytoshort(back)) tempPromptTrigger(function () concord.box("got beckoned "..dir..", go <green>"..back.."<red> to get back") end,1) send("get monolith") send("get monolith") send("get monolith") concord.call("I've been beckoned "..dir.." to (v"..gmcp.Room.Info.num..")!", 0) concord.call("Empress.", 0) end

regexCodeList.string: ^(?:You wander off|You feel yourself compelled to leave the room)\, beckoned by the will of

Trigger.name: Concord radded
Trigger.script: if concord.justmoved then local dir,back = concord.gotMovedDir(concord.lastroom,gmcp.Room.Info.num) back = string.upper(mmp.anytoshort(back)) tempPromptTrigger(function () concord.box("got radded "..dir..", go <green>"..back.."<red> to get back") end,1) end

regexCodeList.string: You see nothing but a blur of colour and feel the ground shift beneath your feet.

Trigger.name: Concord feared
Trigger.script: if concord.justmoved then local dir,back = concord.gotMovedDir(concord.lastroom,gmcp.Room.Info.num) back = string.upper(mmp.anytoshort(back)) tempPromptTrigger(function () concord.box("got feared "..dir..", go <green>"..back.."<red> to get back") end,1) end

regexCodeList.string: ^Unthinking terror seizes your mind as \w+ looms up before you, \w+ visage nightmarish and impossibly powerful.$
You rush about in a state of utter panic.

Trigger.name: Concord thunderclap
Trigger.script: if concord.justmoved then local dir,back = concord.gotMovedDir(concord.lastroom,gmcp.Room.Info.num) back = string.upper(mmp.anytoshort(back)) tempPromptTrigger(function () concord.box("thunderclapped "..dir..", go <green>"..back.."<red> to get back") end,1) end

regexCodeList.string: The shockwave slams into you and propels you backwards until you come to a stop on your back. You find that you've been pushed a ways back by the thunderous clap.

Trigger.name: Concord gusted
Trigger.script: if concord.justmoved then local dir = matches[2] tempPromptTrigger(function () concord.box("we got gusted <yellow>"..dir) end,1) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You are hurled to the (\w+).$

Trigger.name: Stratagem subtract
Trigger.script: concord.stratagem = concord.stratagem - 1 if concord.stratagem < 0 then concord.stratagem = 0 end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.balance == "1" and gmcp.Char.Vitals.equilibrium == "1" and concord.stratagem > 1 then concord.stratagem = 0 end concord.inserting = false

regexCodeList.string: You execute your stratagem.
You clear your mind, no longer preparing to act.
You have not prepared a stratagem.

Trigger.name: Stratagem set
Trigger.script:
local queuen, action = multimatches[2][2], multimatches[2][3]
selectString(queuen, 1) fg("green") deselect() selectString(action, 1) fg("blue") deselect() resetFormat()
concord.stratagem = concord.numberdictionary[multimatches[2][2]]

Trigger.name: Confirmed dsong
Trigger.script: concord.instaPrompt("deathsong-"..matches[2], 8) if concord.canAuto() then if concord.commands.peace then concord.doInsert(concord.commands.peace,matches[2]) else concord.escape = nil end end if not concord.affl.deaf and not concord.affl.earache then send("truehearing") end

regexCodeList.string: sings (\w+), .+ and \w+ looks? directly at you.$

Trigger.name: Self getting meteored
Trigger.script: concord.instaPrompt("meteor", 6) if concord.affl.blackout then concord.escape = nil concord.call("Gust me.",0) end

regexCodeList.string: ^Standing in the centre of a ritual zodiac circle drawn in \w+, (\w+) casts \w+ hands up towards the stars and whispers the names of the planets. \w+ points an imperious finger at ([A-Z][a-z]+) and the spheres of the zodiac glow brightly as the terrible blackness between the stars grows, an ominous shadow falling across the ground.$

Trigger.name: Ally getting twisted
Trigger.script: concord.call(matches[2].." is using TWIST on "..matches[3]..". Hinder them or salt our ally!")

A monolith sigil prevents you from teleporting.

Trigger.name: Ally needs empress
Trigger.script: concord.empresstarget = matches[2] local fling = true if concord.canAuto() and concord.hasSkill("Tarot","Empress") then fling = true end if matches[3] then concord.empresstarget = matches[3] if not concord.roomPlayers[matches[2]] then fling = false end end if fling then send("fling empress at "..concord.empresstarget) end

Trigger.name: Got enemy

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) is an enemy.$
You consider the following adventurers your allies:

Trigger.script: if not table.contains(concord.allies, matches[2]) then table.insert(concord.allies, matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) is an ally.$

Trigger.name: Forced unenemy
Trigger.script: local str = "enemy" for i,v in ipairs(concord.enemies) do str = str.." "..v end send(str)

regexCodeList.string: In a moment of forgiveness, you declare that you have no enemies.

Trigger.name: Forced unally
Trigger.script: local str = "ally" for i,v in ipairs(concord.allies) do str = str.." "..v end send(str)

regexCodeList.string: With an indignant grunt, you remove everyone from your list of allies.
Waves crash together, sending gouts of salt spray up into the air.

Trigger.name: Climb down

regexCodeList.string: Blackness consumes your surroundings as the ravenwoods encompass you. The oppressive shadows close in around you before pulling you into the trees.

Trigger.name: Cloudkill start
Trigger.script: deleteLine() concord.box("CLOUDKILL started","white",".~") concord.call("My cloudkill catalyst started at "..gmcp.Room.Info.num..". Damage enemies!")

regexCodeList.string: With a deliberate gesture you pull the clouds surrounding you into a tight, roiling sphere that surges with energy. Dramatically, you throw your hands wide to send a maelstrom of clouds swirling outward in a raging storm.

Trigger.name: Cloudkill hit
Trigger.script: deleteLine() concord.box("CLOUDKILL hit","green",".^") concord.call("CLOUDKILL catalyst hit at "..gmcp.Room.Info.num.."! Damage enemies!")

regexCodeList.string: The raging storm engulfs you, lightning pulsing within the dark mass of clouds. The faintest whiff of ozone hangs in the air before the clouds are rent by slashing blades of lightning.
^Lightning slams into (\w+)'s body, raking \w+ with burning tendrils. \w+ screams of pain turn to choking gasps as the clouds rush into \w+ mouth.$
^Time constricts around (\w+) as frigid coils of cloud contract around \w+, squeezing tightly as lightning races through the tendrils of cold mist which cling to \w+.$

regexCodeList.string: With a deliberate gesture you pull the clouds surrounding you into a tight, roiling sphere that seems to bend time with its weight. Dramatically, you throw your hands wide to send a maelstrom of clouds swirling outward in a warped vortex.

Trigger.script: deleteLine() concord.box("AURORA hit","green",".^") concord.call("AURORA catalyst hit at "..gmcp.Room.Info.num.."! Damage enemies!")

regexCodeList.string: A burst of light flashes through the thick bank of fog as ribbons of multihued light burst explode in a dazzling display of power.

regexCodeList.string: With a deliberate gesture you pull the clouds surrounding you into a tight, gelid sphere that strains and bulges like a beast fighting to be free. Dramatically, you throw your hands wide to send a gentle breeze flowing out around you.

Trigger.name: Vacuum hit
Trigger.script: deleteLine() concord.box("VACUUM hit","green",".^") concord.call("VACUUM catalyst hit at "..gmcp.Room.Info.num.."! Damage enemies!")

regexCodeList.string: With a sudden rush of air, the atmosphere is drawn in as a vast concussive blast.

^(\w+) slumps down as the air is torn from \w+ lungs by the sudden drop in pressure, \w+ eyes bulging in pain. As if borne on the receding wave of pressure, a wave of lightning crashes down on \w+ in blue-white fury.$
^You lose concentration and your force wall to the (\w+) dissipates.$

Trigger.name: Forcewall started
Trigger.script: concord.box("Forcewall "..matches[2], "green", "|") if concord.pausetimer then killTimer(concord.pausetimer) end disableTrigger("Forcewall started")

regexCodeList.string: ^You tune your force generator with great care and precision, angling it to the (\w+) and creating a feedback loop of repulsive particles which completely restricts passage in or out.$
^Pointing your beam generator at \w+, you unleash raking arcs of lightning that twist across (?:his|her) body.$
pulls the clouds surrounding (?:him|her) into a tight, roiling sphere
pulls the clouds surrounding you into a tight, roiling sphere that seems to bend time with its weight.
With a deliberate gesture \w+ pulls the clouds surrounding \w+ into a tight, gelid sphere that strains and bulges like a beast fighting to be free.

Trigger.name: Call for bombs
Trigger.script: if tonumber(matches[2]) == gmcp.Room.Info.num then send("aerowork catalyst cloudkill") end

regexCodeList.string: ^\(.+\): You say, "Aerochemancers, release bombs at v(\d+)\."$
^\(.+\): \w+ says, "Aerochemancers, release bombs at v(\d+)\."$
You blink your eyes a few times, ending your attempt at breaking down the node present here.
^Booming thunder and shifting winds tell you that (.*?) has been claimed by the storm.$
You whistle up one wind, then another, and another, and twist them into a whirling cyclone. The maelstrom spreads and expands until you find yourself in the eye of a new storm.
You focus your will upon your demesne and allow for its release.
You are not currently holding or bonded to a meld.

Trigger.name: Successful break
Trigger.script: send("ac on",false) concord.box("BROKE "..matches[2], "green","o",matches[2]) concord.call("Broke "..matches[2].."'s node at "..gmcp.Room.Info.num,0)

regexCodeList.string: ^You feel the magics of (\w+) release their grip upon this location.$

Trigger.name: Perceive
Trigger.script: if matches[2] then if ndb.isenemy(matches[2]) and concord.hasSkill("Aeromancy") then send("sm add clan ihc tell Preparing to break node! Please gust the enemy melder out.|aerocast forcecondensate") send("sm add aerocast meld") else disableTrigger("Auto breakmeld") end else if not (concord.aero.demesne.envtype == "clouds") then send("sm add aerocast condensate") end send("sm add aerocast meld") end

regexCodeList.string: You do not sense any magics melded into the local environment.
^You sense the magics of (\w+) melded into the local environment.$

Trigger.name: Cloud environment check
Trigger.script: concord.aero.demesne.envtype = nil if string.find(matches[2], "foggy") or string.find(matches[2], "clouds") then concord.aero.demesne.envtype = "clouds" end

regexCodeList.string: ^Your environment conforms to that of (.+).$

Trigger.name: Illusory terrain check
Trigger.script: local realitycheck = true if string.find(matches[2], gmcp.Room.Info.environment) or string.find(matches[2], "wyrden woods") then realitycheck = false end if realitycheck then send("sm insert 1 realitycheck") end if concord.hasSkill("Aeromancy") then send("perceive") else disableTrigger("Auto breakmeld") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Your environment conforms to that of (.+).$
Why would you change it to what it already is?
You whistle up one wind, then another, and another, and twist them into a whirling cyclone. The maelstrom spreads and expands until you find yourself in the eye of a new storm.

Trigger.name: Breaking
Trigger.script: display(concord.aero.demesne.breaktimer) concord.box("BREAKING MELD, HANDS OFF", "PaleTurquoise") if concord.aero.demesne.breaktimer then killTimer(concord.aero.demesne.breaktimer) end

regexCodeList.string: You whistle sharply and gather the winds around you, preparing to banish the lesser elements.

Trigger.name: Demesne getting broken
Trigger.script: concord.box("Getting broken by "..matches[2], "red","x",matches[2]) send("sm insert 1 free scent")

regexCodeList.string: ^A cool blast of sea-spray brushes your cheek as (\w+) seeks to cleanse your demesne.$
^Static tingles down your spine as (.*?) pits the winds against your demesne.$
^Feverish heat grips you as (.*?) starts to kindle a flame within your demesne.$
^An ominous darkness falls upon your demesne as (\w+) gathers the shadows within it.$
^A swirl of moonhart leaves dance upon your vision as (\w+) seeks to turn your demesne to pure nature.$
Oil-black nests of shadow and bloodied wood crown the twisted ravenwood here as it casts unnaturally long shadows upon the landscape.
From behind a veil of frigid mist rises a shimmering glacier, pristine and majestic as it overlooks a turbulent sea of undulating ice floes.
Plumes of sea-spray jet continuously from the turbulent form of this water elemental, shrouding it in mist.
Its single eye burning with contempt, an imperious crow roosts here with an air of utter disdain.
Spirit moonhart trees rise from the ground, branches overshadowing all with a deep emerald hue.
Furious winds spiral around a patch of relative serenity, marking the eye of the storm.
The haze of poisonous fumes obscures a chasm corrupting the very earth, a tainted wasteland spreading from its gaping maw.
A towering bonfire spits embers and gives off a sweet-smelling, eye-watering haze.
Stones ominously revolve around this earth elemental here, its fuming eyes burning with power.
A fierce storm elemental perches here, conducting the winds with its dark wings.
A noble white stag prances here proudly, wide antlers sprouting from his head like a crown.
An ever-twisting fire elemental dances here in a smokey haze, spewing flame from its maw.

Trigger.name: Illusoryterrain a melded room
Trigger.script: if matches[2] and not ndb.isenemy(matches[2]) then if gmcp.Room.Info.environment == "garden" then send("sm add weave terrain concordance") else send("sm add weave terrain garden") end end disableTrigger("Illusoryterrain a melded room")

regexCodeList.string: ^You sense the magics of (\w+) melded into the local environment.$
You do not sense any magics melded into the local environment.

Trigger.name: Dreamweave siphon
Trigger.script: local motes if concord.config.powers.artifactdreamcatcher then motes = 50 else motes = 25 end motes = motes - tonumber(matches[2]) if motes > 0 then send("dreamweave siphon "..motes) send("dreamweave anchor siphon "..motes.." from") end

regexCodeList.string: ^It holds (\d+) dream motes in reserve and
^Your anchor is located at a path of perfumed petals and has (\d+) motes.$
Focusing your entire will upon the cosmic strands that bind your own body, you quicken every fiber of your being to lightning speed.
The quickening within your being subsides.
The aeonic field that surrounds you pulses, emitting a high-pitched screech and flashing a series of bright lights.
^The time looping around (\w+) spins faster and faster before imploding in on \w+.$
^The time looping around (\w+) spins around a little faster.$
^You look straight at (\w+) and wave your arms in a circular motion, willing the time surrounding \w+ to loop and spin unto itself.$

Trigger.name: Ally doing chronicloop
Trigger.script: if concord.hasSkill("Harmonics") then concord.box("Ally inst clooping "..matches[3],"green","~",matches[3]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) thrusts his palm towards (\w+), and the air around \w+ sizzles.$

Trigger.name: Person got truedeaf
Trigger.script: concord.playerAff(matches[2],"undeaf",false) if matches[2]==concord.target then concord.box(matches[2].. " has truehearing", "maroon","x-",matches[2]) else concord.echo(matches[2].." is deaf!") end if matches[2] == concord.target and concord.canAuto() and concord.config.auto.blanknote then concord.doInsert("play blanknote @target", matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) closes (?:his|her) eyes and inhales deeply, opening (?:his|her) eyes with an odd tilt of (?:his|her) head.$
^(\w+) cries out in astonishment.$
^You play a blank note on .+ and send it to (\w+), but s?he does not appear to hear anything.$
^You play a blank note on .+ and send it to (\w+), who cries out in astonishment.$
^(\w+) cries out in astonishment.$

Trigger.name: Person has truedeaf
Trigger.script: concord.box(matches[2].." is DEAF", "red","X-",matches[2]) concord.playerAff(matches[2],"undeaf",false) if concord.canAuto() and concord.config.auto.blanknote then concord.doInsert("play blanknote @target", matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) cannot hear your harmonies.$
^(\w+) seems oblivious to your music.$
^The air about (\w+) buckles and shifts as (she|he|they) gives? an agonising, silent scream, time warping about \w+ form.$
^(\w+) springs into sudden motion, \w+ legs moving stiffly of their own accord in interweaving steps in time with the minuet ringing through the air.$
^The clarity of your aureolin melody attacks (\w+)\'s senses with the unforgiving glare of a golden morning.$
^(\w+) suddenly clutches at \w+ head, uttering a low, insensate groan.$
^The clarity of \w+'s aureolin melody takes hold of (\w+), evoking thoughts of a golden morning's unforgiving glare.$
^The deafening notes bring (\w+) to \w+ knees.$
^(\w+)'s face looks at peace for a moment.$

Trigger.name: Song tick test end
Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("Song tick test",0) for i,v in pairs(concord.roomPlayers) do if not concord.symph.songhit[i] then concord.playerAff(i,"undeaf",false) end end concord.symph.songhit = {}

regexCodeList.string: You are not performing a song.
^The song ".+" ends and fades away.$
You must start a song before being able to play a refrain.
^You are currently on the (\d+)\w+ stanza of

Trigger.name: Sang a stanza
Trigger.script: for i,v in ipairs(concord.symph.song.lyrics) do if v == matches[2] then concord.symph.current.stanza = i end end

regexCodeList.string: ^"(.+)" you sing,
^Nodding his head to the beat, (\w+) smiles at you,
You feel your song quickly coming to a close.
You feel your song coming to a close.
^".+," you sing, making .+ ring with pure harmonies, and you look directly at (\w+).$
^Time swirls auspiciously around \w+ and space itself ripples darkly. In a flash of bright light, s?he is gone and everything settles down.$

Trigger.name: Concord update song
Trigger.script: if string.lower(matches[2]) == string.lower(concord.symph.song.name) then enableTrigger("Concord update song effects", true) end concord.symph.current.effects = {}

Trigger.name: Concord update song effects
Trigger.script: local i = tonumber(matches[2]) local effect = string.lower(matches[3]) concord.symph.current.effects[i] = effect

Trigger.name: Done
Trigger.script: disableTrigger("Concord update song effects") setTriggerStayOpen("Concord update song",0)

Trigger.name: Imbued an effect
Trigger.script: if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(concord.bard.song.name) then concord.bard.current.effects[tonumber(matches[2])] = string.lower(matches[4]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You imbue the (\d)\w\w stanza of "(\w+)" with the vibration of (\w+).$

Trigger.name: Deathsong - pause all
Trigger.script: concord.paused = true if concord.symph.dsongtimer then killTimer(concord.symph.dsongtimer) end concord.symph.dsongtimer = tempTimer(10, [[concord.paused = false; expandAlias("pp off")]]) disableTrigger("Deathsong - pause all") concord.format(matches[1],matches[2],"red")

regexCodeList.string: ^".+" you sing, loosing grim, sombre notes from .+, and you look directly at (\w+).$

Trigger.name: Dsong finished
Trigger.script: if concord.symph.dsongtimer then killTimer(concord.symph.dsongtimer) end concord.paused = false send("ac on") concord.echo("DEATHSONG FAILED","red")

regexCodeList.string: ^You cease maintaining the killing note that is directed at \w+.$

Trigger.name: Octave up
Trigger.script: concord.box("OCTAVE UP!","gold","~-") concord.call("I have an octave in the room. (v"..gmcp.Room.Info.num..").",1) --You already have set up a maestoso here.

regexCodeList.string: En sempre! You nod your head as the maestoso completes itself in a reverberating harmonic unity.

Trigger.name: Other octave up
Trigger.script: concord.box("OCTAVE UP!","gold","~-") concord.call("There is an octave in the room. (v"..gmcp.Room.Info.num..").",1) --You already have set up a maestoso here.

regexCodeList.string: Your entire being quivers as the ringing note in the air suddenly reaches a reverberating harmonic unity.
En tacet! You nod your head as your octave silences the maestoso here.
Your distant, lingering maestoso fades into silence.
The lingering maestoso fades into silence.
You breathe a sigh of relief as the reverberating ringing note here fades away.
You release the building up of a maestoso.

Trigger.name: Enemy octave up
Trigger.script: if ndb.isenemy(matches[2]) and concord.canAuto() then concord.gust(matches[2]) concord.box("ENEMY "..matches[2].." OCTAVE UP!","DarkOrange","~-",matches[2]) concord.call(matches[2].." is putting up OCTAVE - get them out of the room.",2) end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) plays .*, striking a single perfect note that lingers in the air and builds in strength.$
^You play an octave on .+, striking a single perfect note that lingers in the air and builds in strength.$
^You play an octave on .+, striking a perfect note that is a counterpoint to the maestoso that reverberates in the air.$

Trigger.name: Octave undone
Trigger.script: concord.call("I have removed the octave from the room. (v"..gmcp.Room.Info.num..").",1)

regexCodeList.string: En tacet! You nod your head as your octave silences the maestoso here.
Another musician has already set a maestoso here.
You already have set up a maestoso here.

Trigger.name: Perfectfifth
Trigger.script: concord.box(matches[2].." PERFECTFIFTHED", "magenta","*",matches[2]) concord.call(matches[2].." is perfect fifthed at v"..gmcp.Room.Info.num,1)

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) gazes longingly at you.$

Trigger.name: P5 - someone else did it already

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) gazes longingly at [A-Z][a-z]+.$
^Green smoke leaks out of \w+'s ears.$
^A strange green hue flashes over \w+'s face.$
^Yellow smoke leaks out of \w+'s ears.$
^A burnt yellow flash alights \w+'s face in a sickly light.$
^Purple smoke leaks out of \w+'s ears.$
^A sickly purple hue passes across \w+'s complexion.$
You focus inward for a moment and focus your mind, and focus on one phrase...
Chaos is Harmony.
You feel your Discordant Symmetry fade away.
You have the following defences active:
You are showing that Harmony is Chaos.
You concentrate on curing your own ailments.
You flutter your nose at the air, sensing through a cute little rabbit nose upon your face the faint traces of others in the surrounding area.
A pert little nose takes in a delicate whiff of your surroundings, sensing the faint traces of others in the nearby area.
You scent at the air, your skilled nose picking up the faint traces of others in the surrounding area.

Trigger.name: Got person
Trigger.script: if ndb.isenemy(matches[2]) then else farheal.inarea[matches[2]] = true end

regexCodeList.string: ^You make out the scent of (\w+) coming from .+\.$

Trigger.name: End get people
Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("Farheal people in area", 0) farheal.allies = farheal.inarea

regexCodeList.string: return isPrompt()
^(\w+) currently has (\d+) out of (\d+) health.$
afflicted with the curse of the Aeon.
^bleeding for (\d+) health\.$
transfixed.
asthmatic.
afflicted by horrible asthma.

Trigger.name: Farheal affliction
Trigger.script: for i,v in ipairs(farheal.prios) do if matches[2] == v[1] then display(matches[2]) farheal.people[farheal.succoring]["affs"][matches[2]] = true end end deleteLine()

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ has \d+ afflictions?\.
^You build upon your stratagem, adding action \w+ as: (SUCCOR|HEAL|CURE)
^You build upon your stratagem, adding action \w+ as\:.+ECHO \=\=FARHEAL SUCCORED EVERYONE\=\=\.$

^(?:Nothing can be seen here by that name.|You detect nothing here by that name.|You cannot see that being here.|I do not recognize anything called that here.|Ahh, I am truly sorry, but I do not see anyone by that name here.|You cannot see that being here.)$

Trigger.name: Finished succoring
Trigger.script: disableTrigger("Farheal succor") disableTrigger("Gag healing stratagem spam") concord.deleteAllP() local todo = farheal.process() if todo then disableTrigger("Target not here") enableTrigger("Gag target not here message") send("sm add "..todo) end if farheal.auto then if farheal.timer then killTimer(farheal.timer) end farheal.timer = tempTimer(1, [[farheal.succor()]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ==Farheal succored everyone==

Trigger.name: Farheal did a heal or cure
Trigger.script: concord.deleteAllP() enableTrigger("Target not here") disableTrigger("Gag healing stratagem spam") disableTrigger("Gag target not here message")

regexCodeList.string: ==Farheal healed==

Alias.name: Pause concord
Alias.script: local bool = nil if matches[2] == "on" then bool = true end if matches[2] == "off" then bool = false end concord.pause(bool)

Alias.name: Call mode
Alias.script: concord.calling.call_mode = tonumber(matches[2]) concord.echo("Call mode activated: Level "..matches[2])

Alias.name: Diagnose
Alias.script: if concord.hasSkill("Healing") then concord.doInsert("succor me", nil, true) else concord.doInsert("diagnose", nil) end

Alias.name: Leap
Alias.script: concord.doClear(true) local cmd = string.gsub(concord.commands.leap, "@direction", matches[2]) concord.doAdd(cmd)

Alias.name: Drop monolith and palm
Alias.script: if concord.config.powers.artimono then concord.doInsert("artisigils recall "..concord.config.powers.artimono.."|drop "..concord.config.powers.artimono) else concord.doInsert("drop monolith confirm|drop palm confirm") end

Alias.name: Get monolith and palm
Alias.script: if concord.config.powers.artimono then send("artisigils recall "..concord.config.powers.artimono) else concord.doInsert("get monolith|get palm") end

Alias.name: Toggle hearing
Alias.script: if concord.affl.deaf then send("ac mod steamqueue remove truehearing") else send("ac mod steamqueue insert 1 truehearing") end

Alias.name: Aeon
Alias.script: if concord.hasSkill("Astrology") and astro.attack.aff(matches[2],"aeon") then concord.doAdd(astro.attack.aff(matches[2],"aeon"),matches[2],false,true) elseif concord.commands.aeon then concord.doAdd(concord.commands.aeon, matches[2]) else concord.echo("We can't aeon!") end

Alias.name: Lust
Alias.script: concord.doAdd("fling fool at ground|fling lust at @target", matches[2])

Alias.name: Empress someone
Alias.script: if not matches[2] then matches[2] = concord.empresstarget end matches[2] = concord.getFullName(matches[2]) concord.doClear() concord.call("Empress "..matches[2],1) send("sm add get monolith|fling empress at "..matches[2].."|peppermint activate retrieve "..matches[2])

Alias.name: Serpent
Alias.script: if not concord.affl.powerspikes then if concord.canAuto() then concord.doClear(true) concord.doAdd("invoke serpent|invoke serpent|invoke serpent|invoke serpent|invoke serpent") else send("ac off") if concord.actimer then killTimer(concord.actimer); concord.actimer = nil end concord.actimer = tempTimer("3", [[send("ac on")]]) send("invoke serpent") end else concord.box("GOT POWERSPIKES", "red", "^") end

Alias.name: Chase a person
Alias.script: enableTrigger("Concord scent and chase") concord.doInsert("scent") concord.chasetarget = matches[2] or concord.target

Alias.name: Path to room
Alias.script: -- hit go again to actually go concord.gotoRoom(concord.pathto)

Alias.name: group me
Alias.script: local string = "Come to v"..gmcp.Room.Info.num.." in "..gmcp.Room.Info.area.."." concord.call(string)

Alias.name: Add enemies
Alias.script: -- Add one or more enemies -- "enadd a" to add a -- "enadd a b c" to add a, b, and c enableTrigger("concord enemied") send("unally "..matches[2],false) send("enemy "..matches[2],false)

Alias.name: Add allies
Alias.script: -- Add one or more ally -- "aladd a" to add a -- "aladd a b c" to add a, b, and c enableTrigger("concord allied") send("unenemy "..matches[2],false) send("ally "..matches[2],false)

Alias.name: Enemy all enemies in area (requires scent)
Call out enemies
Alias.script: local tbl = {} for name,v in pairs(concord.areaPlayers) do if ndb.isenemy(name) then tbl[#tbl+1] = name end end str = table.concat(tbl, ", ") echo("Enemies present in "..gmcp.Room.Info.area..": "..str)

Alias.name: Start demesne setup
Alias.script:
if not concord.demesne then concord.demesne = {} end concord.demesne.effects = { {name="Westwind",offset=0}, {name="Swiftwind",offset=0}, {name="Northwind",offset=-0.5}, {name="Eastwind",offset=-0.5}, {name="Blizzard",offset=0}, {name="Thunderclouds",offset=0}, {name="Twister",offset=0}, {name="Rainbowclouds",offset=0}, {name="Squalls",offset=0,hidden=true}, }
if matches[2] == "t" then concord.demesne.setup = 2 elseif matches[2] == "q" then concord.demesne.setup = 3 else concord.demesne.setup = 1 end enableTrigger("Effects start") send("demesne") concord.echo("Starting demesne setup.")

Alias.name: demup
Alias.script: concord.demesne.effects = { {name="Westwind",offset=0}, {name="Swiftwind",offset=0}, {name="Northwind",offset=-0.5}, {name="Eastwind",offset=-0.5}, {name="Blizzard",offset=0}, {name="Thunderclouds",offset=0}, {name="Twister",offset=0}, {name="Rainbowclouds",offset=0}, {name="Squalls",offset=0,hidden=true}, } for i,v in ipairs(concord.demesne.effects) do send("sm add aerocast "..v.name.." demesne") end

Alias.name: Condensate
Alias.script: concord.doClear() if matches[2] then concord.doAdd("aerocast forcecondensate",nil,false,false) else concord.doAdd("aerocast condensate",nil,false,false) end

Alias.name: Auto meld
Alias.script: enableTrigger("Auto breakmeld") concord.doClear() send("chop tree with axe") send("survey")

Alias.name: Break
Alias.script: enableTrigger("Auto breakmeld") concord.doClear() send("chop tree with axe") send("survey")

Alias.name: Dreambeast
Alias.script: matches[2] = matches[2] or concord.target if concord.hasSkill("Aerochemantics") then send("aerowork focus "..matches[2]) end concord.doAdd("dreamweave beast @target",matches[2])

Alias.name: Embed
Alias.script:
local motelist = {"memoryloss", "stupidity"} local todo = {} for i = 0,9,1 do local ind = math.mod(i,#motelist)+1 todo[#todo+1] = motelist[ind] end
local string = table.concat(todo, " ") concord.doAdd("generator embed "..string)

Alias.name: Forcewall
Alias.script: if concord.pausetimer then killTimer(concord.pausetimer) end concord.pause(true) enableTrigger("Forcewall started") concord.doAdd("aerowork forcewall " .. matches[2]) concord.pausetimer = tempTimer(5, [[concord.pause(false)]])

Alias.name: Focus
Alias.script: if matches[2] then send("aerowork focus " .. matches[2]) else send("aerowork focus " .. target) end

Alias.name: Beam
Alias.script:
if matches[2] then send("stratagem clear") send("stratagem add generator beam " .. target .. " " .. matches[2]) else
send("stratagem clear") send("stratagem add free discern " .. target) send("stratagem add free beast order breathe lightning " .. target) send("stratagem add generator beam " .. target) end

Alias.name: Hyperbeam
Alias.script:
if matches[2] then send("stratagem clear") send("stratagem add generator hyperbeam " .. target .. " " .. matches[2]) else
send("stratagem clear") send("stratagem add free discern " .. target) send("stratagem add free beast order breathe soot " .. target) send("stratagem add generator hyperbeam " .. target) end

Alias.name: Hyperbeam super
Alias.script: send("stratagem clear") send("stratagem add free discern " .. target) send("stratagem add free beast order breathe soot " .. target) send("stratagem add generator hyperbeam " .. target .. " super")

Alias.name: Raise fields
Alias.script: concord.doClear() concord.doAdd("aerowork stratus field",nil,nil,false) concord.doAdd("aerowork cirrus field",nil,nil,false) concord.doAdd("aerowork cumulus field",nil,nil,false) concord.doAdd("aerowork altostratus field",nil,nil,false) concord.doAdd("aerowork concentrate",nil,nil,false)

Alias.name: Engineer defences
Alias.script: send("ENGINEER CONDUCTIVE AMPLIFIER") send("ENGINEER IONIC CLOUD") send("ENGINEER INSULATION") send("ENGINEER ANTIGRAVITY DISC") send("ENGINEER DYNOMATIC CLOUD") send("ENGINEER FORCE GENERATOR") send("ENGINEER POSITRONIC CLOUD")

Alias.name: Rad
Alias.script: local tar = concord.getFullName(matches[2]) concord.doAdd("sling rad at @target",tar,nil,false) concord.call("attempting to rad "..tar)

Alias.name: Sunspam
Alias.script: concord.doAdd("outr salt|draw zodiac in salt|draw zodiac in salt|"..concord.negSpheres(1),matches[2],false,false) concord.doAdd(concord.negSpheres(3).."|astrocast sun ray at @target",matches[2],false,false) concord.doAdd(concord.negSpheres(3).."|astrocast sun ray at @target",matches[2],false,false) concord.doAdd(concord.negSpheres(3).."|astrocast sun ray at @target",matches[2],false,false) concord.doAdd(concord.negSpheres(3).."|astrocast sun ray at @target|echo SUN STRATAGEM 2 TIME",matches[2],false,false)

Alias.name: Sunspam 2
Alias.script: concord.doAdd("astrocast meteor at @target|astrocast meteor at @target|astrocast meteor at @target",matches[2],false,false) concord.doAdd("astrocast sun ray at @target|astrocast sun ray at @target",matches[2],false,false) concord.doAdd("astrocast sun ray at @target|astrocast sun ray at @target",matches[2],false,false) concord.doAdd("discharge blaster @target|astrocast sun ray at @target",matches[2],false,false) concord.doAdd("astrocast sun ray at @target|astrocast sun ray at @target",matches[2],false,false)

Alias.name: Sunspam 3
Alias.script: concord.doAdd("abjure quickening",nil,false,false) concord.doAdd("astrocast sun ray at @target|astrocast sun ray at @target",matches[2],false,false) concord.doAdd("astrocast sun ray at @target|astrocast sun ray at @target",matches[2],false,false) concord.doAdd("astrocast sun ray at @target|astrocast sun ray at @target",matches[2],false,false) concord.doAdd("astrocast sun ray at @target|astrocast sun ray at @target",matches[2],false,false) concord.doAdd("astrocast sun ray at @target|astrocast sun ray at @target",matches[2],false,false)

Alias.name: asthma
Alias.script: if concord.hasSkill("Astrology") and astro.attack.aff(matches[2],"asthma") then concord.doAdd(astro.attack.aff(matches[2],"asthma"),matches[2],false,true) else concord.doAdd("crystalspin malefactgem @target asthma", matches[2]) end

Alias.name: plexup
Alias.script: send("sm clear") send("sm add crystalspin ruby") send("sm add crystalspin sapphire") send("sm add crystalspin emerald") send("sm add crystalspin garnet") send("sm add crystalspin bloodstone") send("sm add crystalspin opal") send("sm add crystalspin turquoise") send("sm add crystalspin amethyst") send("crystalplex defend me garnet emerald opal amethyst")

Alias.name: unplex
Alias.script: local arg if matches[2] == "off" then arg = "offense" elseif matches[2] == "def" then arg = "defense" else arg = "all" end send("sm add crystalplex deactivate "..arg)

Alias.name: Combo with other Inst
Alias.script: local target = matches[2] or concord.target concord.setTarget(matches[2]) concord.doClear() concord.doAdd("timechant insight|timechant timeechoes @target|timechant oracle @target|timechant aeon @target", target)

Alias.name: Combo solo
Alias.script: local target = matches[2] or concord.target concord.setTarget(matches[2]) concord.doClear() concord.doAdd("timechant insight|timechant timeechoes @target|timechant oracle @target|crystalspin malefactgem @target asthma", target)

Alias.name: Inst 1
Alias.script: send("sm clear") local target = matches[2] or concord.target concord.setTarget(target) concord.doAdd("timechant insight") concord.doAdd("timechant timeechoes @target", matches[2])

Alias.name: Raise anti aeon auras
Alias.script: concord.doAdd("radiate auric") tempTimer(5,[[concord.doAdd("radiate phlegmatic")]]) concord.doAdd("radiate choleric")

Alias.name: Deathsong
Alias.script: concord.doClear() send("ac off") if matches[2] then concord.setTarget(matches[2]) end matches[2] = matches[2] or concord.target concord.call("Attempting deathsong on "..concord.getFullName(matches[2]),1) concord.symph.perform(nil,concord.symph.dsong,matches[2]) enableTrigger("Deathsong - pause all") concord.symph.dsongtimer = tempTimer(4, [[concord.paused = false; expandAlias("pp off")]])

Alias.name: Octave
Alias.script: if matches[2] then concord.doClear() concord.doAdd("play octave tacet") else concord.doClear() concord.doAdd("play octave sempre") end

Alias.name: Discordantchord
Alias.script: concord.setTarget(matches[2]) if concord.config.powers.monocle == true then concord.diagnosedo="discordantchord" concord.doAdd("monocle diagnose @target",matches[2],false,false) else concord.doClear() concord.symph.play(matches[2], "discordantchord") end

Alias.name: Discordant symmetry (with bodyfuel)
Alias.script: concord.doClear() concord.doAdd("eflow discordantsymmetry chaotic",nil,false,false) if concord.hasSkill("Psychometabolism","Bodyfuel") then concord.doAdd("psi id bodyfuel 5",nil,false,false) concord.doAdd("psi id bodyfuel 5|psi id bodyfuel 4",nil,false,false) end

Alias.name: eburst
Alias.command: sm add eflow enigmaticburst harmonic health

Alias.name: augmentedmemory
Alias.script: if concord.tessenchi.discordantsymmetry then send("sm add eflow augmentedmemory chaotic") else send("sm add eflow augmentedmemory harmonic") end send("sm add psi id bodyfuel 5")

Alias.name: farheal add ally to list
Alias.script: local tbl = string.split(matches[2], " ") for i,v in ipairs(tbl) do farheal.ally(v,true) end farheal.showAllies()

Alias.name: farheal remove ally from list
Alias.script: local tbl = string.split(matches[2], " ") for i,v in ipairs(tbl) do farheal.ally(v,false) end farheal.showAllies()

ScriptGroup.name: Concord - Base
ScriptGroup.script: if not concord then concord = {} end concord.calling = concord.calling or {} concord.escape = false concord.target = "none"

Script.name: concord.load
Script.script: function concord.load() f = io.open(concord.config.directory.."Concord.bin", 'rb') local bytecode = f:read('*all') f:close() loadstring(bytecode)() raiseEvent("concord loaded") concord.paused = true concord.escape = false concord.target = "none" end

Script.name: concord.skills
concord.instakills
concord.customPrompt
Script.script:
if not concord.customPrompt then concord.customPrompt = {} end color_table.a_darkgreen = {0, 179, 0}
function concord.customPrompt.display() local t = {} t[#t+1] = concord.preprompt or "" for _, stat in ipairs {"hp","mp","ego"} do t[#t+1] = concord.customPrompt.color(stat) t[#t+1] = concord.vitals[stat] t[#t+1] = "<dim_gray>|" t[#t+1] = concord.customPrompt.color(stat) t[#t+1] = concord.vitals[stat.."percent"] t[#t+1] = "% " end t[#t+1] = concord.customPrompt.color("pow") t[#t+1] = concord.vitals["pow"] t[#t+1] = " " if table.contains(gmcp.Char.Skills.Groups, "Healing") then t[#t+1] = "<white>" t[#t+1] = gmcp.Char.Vitals["empathy"] t[#t+1] = " " end if table.contains(gmcp.Char.Skills.Groups, "Zarakido") then t[#t+1] = "<white>" t[#t+1] = gmcp.Char.Vitals["enigmaticflow"] t[#t+1] = " " end t[#t+1] = "<pale_violet_red>" t[#t+1] = gmcp.Char.Vitals["bleeding"] t[#t+1] = "<gray>|" t[#t+1] = "<pale_violet_red>" t[#t+1] = gmcp.Char.Vitals["bruising"] t[#t+1] = "<gray>|" t[#t+1] = "<pale_violet_red>" t[#t+1] = gmcp.Char.Vitals["hemorrhaging"] t[#t+1] = "<orchid> " t[#t+1] = concord.customPrompt.bals() t[#t+1] = "<gray>" t[#t+1] = concord.customPrompt.defs() t[#t+1] = " " if table.contains(gmcp.Char.Skills.Groups, "Kata") then t[#t+1] = gmcp.Char.Vitals["stance"] end t[#t+1] = "<gray>[" t[#t+1] = "<SteelBlue>" t[#t+1] = concord.target or "none" t[#t+1] = "<gray>]" t[#t+1] = concord.customPrompt.changes(true) return table.concat(t) end
function concord.customPrompt.color(stat) local color = "<yellow>" if concord.vitals[stat.."percent"] >= 75 then color = "<a_darkgreen>" elseif concord.vitals[stat.."percent"] <= 25 then color = "<red>" end if stat == "pow" and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals[stat]) >= 7 then color = "<a_darkgreen>" end return color end
function concord.customPrompt.changes(percent) local t = {} for i,v in ipairs({"hp","mp","ego"}) do if concord.deltaVitals[v] then if concord.deltaVitals[v] == 0 then else t[#t+1] = " " if concord.deltaVitals[v] > 0 then t[#t+1] = "<green>+" elseif concord.deltaVitals[v] < 0 then t[#t+1] = "<red>" end t[#t+1] = concord.deltaVitals[v] t[#t+1] = string.sub(v,1,1) if percent then t[#t+1] = " <dim_gray>" if concord.deltaVitals[v.."percent"] > 0 then t[#t+1] = "+" end t[#t+1] = concord.deltaVitals[v.."percent"].."\%" end end end end local str = table.concat(t) if str == "" then else str = "<dim_gray>("..string.sub(str,2,-1).."<dim_gray>)" end return str end
function concord.customPrompt.bals() local t = {} if gmcp.Char.Vitals.beastbal == "1" then t[#t+1]="B" else t[#t+1]="_" end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.equilibrium == "1" then t[#t+1]="e" else t[#t+1]="_" end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.balance == "1" then t[#t+1]="x" else t[#t+1]="_" end return table.concat(t) end
function concord.customPrompt.defs() local t = {} if gmcp.Char.Vitals.kafe == "1" then t[#t+1]="k" end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.deaf == "1" then t[#t+1]="d" end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.blind == "1" then t[#t+1]="b" end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.prone == "1" then t[#t+1]="p" end return table.concat(t) end

Script.name: concord.config
concord.timestamp
concord.inst.crystalTarget
Script.script:
if not concord.inst then concord.inst = {} end
function concord.inst.crystalTarget(event,target) if not target then target = concord.target end if concord.hasSkill("Harmonics") and concord.canAuto() then send("crystalplex attack "..target.." sapphire turquoise ruby bloodstone") send("crystalplex defend me garnet emerald opal amethyst") end end registerAnonymousEventHandler("concord changed target", "concord.inst.crystalTarget")

Script.name: Song init
farheal.init
farheal.prios
